attributes.action: Abolition of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's become clear that the house of commons is longer fit for purpose and no longer able to carry out the wishes of the people it represents. Cronyism and mps stealing taxpayers money for 2nd homes are the tip of the iceberg. The people have lost faith. Absolute monarchy represent better value for money

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
